item.title: 密苏里大学学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在纳什维尔（Nashville）的一次夜游中失踪，他失踪前的几段监控视频都拍到了他的身影。
item.description:
University of Missouri student Riley Strain was caught on several surveillance videos before he vanished during a night out in Nashville. https://t.co/QSSazXkJmB pic.twitter.com/qMtahvpLmp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国和日本官员表示，去年11月日本南部发生致命坠机事故后，美国和日本军方在完成必要的维护和训练后，将恢复鱼鹰飞机在日本的飞行。
item.description:
The U.S. and Japanese militaries will resume flights of Osprey aircraft in Japan after completing necessary maintenance and training following a fatal crash in southern Japan last November, officials said. https://t.co/lewCbmrDfo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据一份新的联邦情报公报称，对高级官员的威胁正在上升，而企图造成伤害或恐惧的潜在攻击者正越来越多地试图攻击他们的住处--真正的住处。
item.description:
Threats to high-profile officials are on the rise, and would-be attackers seeking to cause harm or fear are increasingly trying to hit them where they live – literally – according to a new federal intelligence bulletin. https://t.co/w8GrE9LUpC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 女演员奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）公开了她与乳腺癌近一年的私下斗争，并透露她已经接受了四次手术，包括双乳切除术。
item.description:
Actress Olivia Munn is opening up about her nearly year-long private battle with breast cancer and revealed that she has undergone four surgeries, including a double mastectomy. https://t.co/bazHvnM0Ze pic.twitter.com/rXDopx2Yxf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）主席的一封信称，波音公司在今年早些时候阿拉斯加航空公司一架航班发生爆炸之前，重新安装了机舱门塞的维修设施的监控录像被涂改。
item.description:
BREAKING: Boeing overwrote surveillance footage from the repair facility where a door plug was reinstalled ahead of the blowout on an Alaska Airlines flight earlier this year, according to a letter from the NTSB chair. https://t.co/aagqNjMD77 pic.twitter.com/B5FaSRf7gN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）主席的一封信称，波音公司在今年早些时候阿拉斯加航空公司一架航班发生爆炸之前，重新安装了机舱门塞的维修设施的监控录像被涂改。
item.description:
BREAKING: Boeing overwrote surveillance footage from the repair facility where a door plug was reinstalled ahead of the blowout on an Alaska Airlines flight earlier this year, according to a letter from the NTSB chair. https://t.co/qFGhtj2e2x

item.title: 白宫已在全国范围内发出行动呼吁，以挽救阿片类药物过量造成的生命。
item.description:
The White House has launched a nationwide call-to-action to save lives from opioid overdoses. https://t.co/cwXz6TlT3v

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 新消息：已故俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的前高级助手列昂尼德-沃尔科夫周二晚在立陶宛的家附近遭到一名袭击者用锤子袭击，他将这次袭击归咎于克里姆林宫，目前正在康复中。
item.description:
NEW: Leonid Volkov, a former top aide to the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, is recovering after he was attacked with a hammer by an assailant on Tuesday night near his home in Lithuania, in an assault he blamed on the Kremlin. https://t.co/XoRCLRkkHm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 莉莎-明奈利（Liza Minnelli）又过了一个生日，而且她丝毫没有放慢脚步的迹象。
item.description:
Another birthday is in the books for Liza Minnelli — and she is showing no signs of slowing down. https://t.co/mUMPznBz1V

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据卫生官员称，一名新墨西哥州男子死于鼠疫，这是 2020 年以来该州发生的首例人类死亡事件：
item.description:
A New Mexico man has died from plague in the state's first human fatality since 2020, according to health officials.

Read more: https://t.co/GyKiQ6orM9 pic.twitter.com/7v2LyviG30

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: Dollar Tree 第四季度意外亏损，并将关闭近 1000 家门店，因为这家折扣零售商削减了其近十年前收购的竞争对手连锁店的价值。
item.description:
Dollar Tree swung to a surprise fourth-quarter loss and will close nearly 1,000 stores after the discount retailer slashed the value of a rival chain it acquired almost a decade ago. https://t.co/p8WBjGnRsz pic.twitter.com/oCNISpyHD6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 英格兰国家医疗服务机构已禁止使用青春期阻断剂来治疗变性未成年人的性别焦虑症或性别不协调。
item.description:
England's National Health Service has banned the use of puberty blockers for the treatment of gender dysphoria or gender incongruence in transgender minors. https://t.co/YzstZDlqqm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 亨特-拜登（Hunter Biden）拒绝了众议院共和党人邀请他下周与前商业伙伴一起出席公开听证会的邀请。
item.description:
Hunter Biden has rejected an invitation from House Republicans to appear for a public hearing next week alongside former business associates. https://t.co/LlQTfm2aH0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一部新的纪录片聚焦于 20 世纪 90 年代和 21 世纪初一些最受欢迎的 Nickelodeon 儿童节目的幕后故事。
item.description:
A new documentary focuses on what some claim went on behind the scenes at some of the most popular Nickelodeon children's shows of the 1990s and early 2000s. https://t.co/BSLum53HPx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：众议院通过了两党立法，迫使TikTok的中国母公司出售该社交媒体平台，否则将在美国面临禁令：
item.description:
BREAKING: The House has passed bipartisan legislation to force TikTok's Chinese parent company to sell the social media platform or face a ban in the U.S.

Read more: https://t.co/98GnkioFxi pic.twitter.com/fx5wtNgzQs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：众议院通过法案，如果 TikTok 的中国所有者不出售该应用，将禁止使用 TikTok。如果法案获得通过，ByteDance 将有六个月的时间剥离 TikTok，然后应用商店将开始禁止访问 TikTok。
item.description:
BREAKING: House passes bill that would ban TikTok if its Chinese owners don't sell the app.

If enacted, the bill would give ByteDance six months to divest from TikTok before app stores would start prohibiting access. https://t.co/3CW9JWUn3o pic.twitter.com/gnJgqgYV3N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：众议院通过了两党联合立法，迫使 TikTok 的中国母公司出售该社交媒体平台，否则将在美国面临禁令。
item.description:
BREAKING: The House has passed bipartisan legislation to force TikTok's Chinese parent company to sell the social media platform or face a ban in the U.S. https://t.co/7244c7mQoD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息密歇根州校园枪手伊桑-克朗布里（Ethan Crumbley）的父亲詹姆斯-克朗布里（James Crumbley）将不会在过失杀人罪的审判中作证，因为辩方在只传唤了一名证人后就休息了。
item.description:
JUST IN: James Crumbley, the father of Michigan school shooter Ethan Crumbley, will not testify in his manslaughter trial as the defense rested after just one witness. https://t.co/jI3lQxgDPo pic.twitter.com/fxM6KcT6nW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：富尔顿县（Fulton County）法官撤销了针对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）及其几名同案被告的干扰选举起诉书中的六项罪名。
item.description:
BREAKING: A Fulton County judge has thrown out six counts contained in the election interference indictment against Donald Trump and several of his co-defendants. https://t.co/a9rPCM2RJ1 pic.twitter.com/mnHSghC9fY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：富尔顿县（Fulton County）法官撤销了针对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）及其几名同案被告的干扰选举起诉书中的六项罪名。

item.title: 最新消息密歇根州校园枪手伊桑-克朗布里（Ethan Crumbley）的父亲詹姆斯-克朗布里（James Crumbley）将不会在过失杀人罪的审判中作证，因为辩方在周三只听取了一名证人的证词后就休息了。
item.description:
JUST IN: James Crumbley, the father of Michigan school shooter Ethan Crumbley, will not testify in his manslaughter trial as the defense rested after just one witness Wednesday. https://t.co/TMDAgsDaLC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 英国保守党政府的一位部长周三表示，该党不打算退还去年从一位捐赠者那里获得的 1,280 万美元，该捐赠者曾对一位黑人立法者发表过被谴责为种族主义的言论。
item.description:
A minister in Britain’s Conservative government said Wednesday that the party does not plan to give back $12.8 million it received in the past year from a donor who made comments about a Black lawmaker that have been condemned as racist. https://t.co/mQfDKxIB6m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿迪达斯称，去年 Yeezy 鞋的销售额已为打击反犹太主义和其他形式仇恨的团体捐赠或计划捐赠超过 1.5 亿美元。
item.description:
Adidas says it’s donated or is planning to give away more than $150 million to groups fighting antisemitism and other forms of hate from the sales of Yeezy shoes last year. https://t.co/1o5kcHxkni

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 新消息：总统独立候选人小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
item.description:
NEW: Independent candidate for president Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said Tuesday that he had selected his running mate, but declined to identify them. https://t.co/MnVfASES3W

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 周三上午，在日本中部，一枚商业火箭在升空后不久故意爆炸，这枚火箭的目标是成为日本首个成功将卫星送入轨道的私营企业。
item.description:
A commercial rocket that was aiming to be Japan's first private sector success at putting a satellite into orbit was intentionally exploded shortly after liftoff Wednesday morning in central Japan following a problem that's still under investigation. https://t.co/U4tyBhNR4K pic.twitter.com/orNdXUbtjd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据检察官称，两名男子因涉嫌炸毁一名妇女的住宅并计划将 "一条大蟒蛇放进受害人家中吃掉受害人的女儿 "而受到指控。
item.description:
Two men have been charged after allegedly bombing a woman’s home and planning to release “a large python into the victim’s home to eat the victim’s daughter,” according to prosecutors. https://t.co/q3KTejTWxd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据美国南方司令部的一份声明，一队美国海军陆战队已被派往海地太子港的美国大使馆提供额外的安全保护。
item.description:
A team of U.S. Marines has been sent to provide additional security at the U.S. embassy in Port au Prince, Haiti, according to a statement from U.S. Southern Command. https://t.co/odtZhWXl3L

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 25 岁的杰斯说，在确诊癌症后，他感到非常震惊，决定在社交媒体上记录自己的抗癌历程，以帮助人们提高对癌症的认识。
item.description:
After the shock of his diagnosis, 25-year-old Jace said he decided to document his cancer journey on social media to help raise awareness. https://t.co/EAmOeeYDp9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 三名妇女和一条狗被发现死在拉斯维加斯的两处公寓中，警方称他们开枪打死了一名持枪对峙的潜在嫌疑人。
item.description:
Three women and a dog were found dead in two separate apartments in Las Vegas as police say they shot and killed a potential suspect in the case who confronted them with a firearm, authorities say. https://t.co/mVCXh6rzeP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三参观了这家电动汽车制造商在欧洲的第一家工厂，柏林郊外的这家工厂在疑似纵火袭击切断电力供应约一周后恢复了生产。
item.description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk visited the electric car maker's first European plant Wednesday as production resumed at the factory just outside Berlin about a week after a suspected arson attack cut its power supply. https://t.co/XMDJmFKWh7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024
